name: engify-rag-lambda
description: RAG service for Engify.ai deployed on AWS Lambda

scripts.deploy: zip -r rag-lambda.zip rag-lambda.py && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name engify-rag --zip-file fileb://rag-lambda.zip
scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name engify-rag --runtime python3.9 --role arn:aws:iam::${AWS_ACCOUNT_ID}:role/lambda-execution-role --handler rag-lambda.lambda_handler --zip-file fileb://rag-lambda.zip
